work.description: A web developer or programmer is someone who takes a web design - which has been created by either a client or a design team - and turns it into a website.

Innovation project with the Conselho Nacional de Justiça (CNJ). This is the Process Mining Laboratory project in the Judiciary. The project involves research in process mining, study of existing tools and design and development of a process mining tool with a focus on the Brazilian judiciary.

education.description:
The Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science has as main objective to provide a well-founded basic training, enabling
its graduates both for the job market and for the academic career, with particular incentive to the creation of companies through the
existing infrastructure at the Computer Center for the incubation of new companies operating in the sector.

The Computer Technician develops computer programs, following the specifications and paradigms of the programming logic and the
programming languages. Uses systems development environments, operating systems and databases. Performs
computer programs, keeping records that allow analysis and refinement of results. Performs maintenance of
deployed computers.

academic.description:
In this project the objective was to develop a gamified application for mobile devices using georeferencing,
to support the identification of Aedes aegypti outbreaks.
academic.name: Projeto de extensão Sertão sem Aedes

academic.description:
The project had the proposal of developing a web platform to geo-refer, using Google Maps technology, the
main points of interest in the city of Afogados da Ingazeira.
academic.name: Projeto de extensão Aculá
